page.title: 11Diet in Solihull
page.content: I found out that most children preferred{fast food.}More healthy food like{salads}was the least popular. Adults preferred{home cooking}or {eating out.}Of 27 people surveyed 9 people preferred eating out, 10 people preferred home cooking, 5 people preferred fast food, of which fish and chips is still the most popular kind, and 3 people preferred salads. An example of favourite home cooking was a traditional English roast meat and vegetables. In the area of fast food beefburgers came top. Fizzy{drinks}were favoured by young children; adults preferred tea or coffee. The most popular time to eat the main meal of the day was in the evening with their families.
